video_title: What The Ultimate Study On Happiness Reveals

top_positive_comments.text: What actually makes me happy is every new Veritasium upload
Money doesn’t buy happiness, but it removes a lot of sources of unhappiness

1. Physical fitness
2. Loving relationships
That's it for a healthy and meaningful life
Social media was created for relationships but ultimately made us lonelier than ever
Dang, this video made me happier than I expected. Robert was so good at explaining things and quite calming to listen to!

top_negative_comments.text: I think the most important factor is health (physical and mental). Chronic pain is devastating
Having had money and a bad marriage the money didn't help. I would rather laugh in a Subaru than cry in a Ferrari.
what a bad day to be alive
Comes down to a harmony between what we need, what we desire, are what we can hold on to.
Me at 8:23 be like: im fcked. Lonely, obese, and a smoker. Well 🤷
